import React, { useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Surahs() { const [Data, setData] = useState({}); var index = []; var index2 = []; var index3 = []; var index4 = []; var index5 = []; var index6 = []; var index7 = []; for (var i = 0; i <= 114; i++) { if(i<4){ index.push(i); } if(i >=4 && i<9){ index2.push(i); } if(i >=9 && i< 16){ index3.push(i); } if(i >=16 && i< 25){ index4.push(i); } if(i >=25 && i< 36){ index5.push(i); } if(i >=36 && i< 49){ index6.push(i); } if(i >=49 && i< 114){ index7.push(i); } } useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { const res = await fetch("http://104.238.102.6/~yildirim/quran.com/api/chapters/en"); res.json().then(res => setData(res)) } fetchData(); }); return (
  • All
